pageProduct.name: Poise Pant Thin & Discreet Small/ Medium 5 Pack
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Poise Pants have been specially designed for bladder leaks, with the superior 3-in-1 dryness, comfort and odour control which a period pad can't provide. Poise pants have an Ultra-Lite™ absorbent core which is 55% thinner and more comfortable than Poise Heavy pads and 2x more absorbent than leading overnight period pads.

  • Superior 3-in-1 dryness, comfort and odour control which a period pad can't provide
  • Absorb-Loc® core quickly & continuously neutralises odours
  • RapidDry™ cover is 7x drier than leading overnight period pads
  • Curve hugging feminine design that defines your silhouette
  • Soft and Breathable: 360° stretchy cloth-like fabric and underwear like elastic waistband shaped to hug your curves and move with your body.
  • Ultra-Lite™ absorbent core is 55% thinner and more comfortable than Poise Heavy Pads
  • 2x more absorbent than leading overnight period pads.
  • Anti-Bunch technology to ensure the protections stays in place securely all day, unlike pads which can move & bunch up
